paper.title: Computing threshold functions by depth-3 threshold circuits with smaller thresholds of their gates

author.org: Department of Computer Science, University of Trier, D-54286 Trier, Germany

paper.abstract: Abstract We consider depth-3 unbounded fanin threshold circuits. Gates are usual threshold functions T k n which compute 1 iff at least k of the inputs are equal to 1; the minimum min k , n âˆ’ k + 1 is the threshold value of this gate. We show that the function T k n cannot be computed by a small depth-3 threshold circuit with threshold values of its gates much smaller than k .
